senses.sense_definition: An incorrect or bad hit, especially in sports where a ball is struck.

examples.text: The tennis player groaned in frustration after the <w>mishit</w> sent the ball into the net.
It was a lucky <w>mishit</w> that somehow landed inside the line and won him the game.

senses.sense_definition: To hit a ball or object incorrectly or badly, often resulting in a poor shot.

examples.text: He tends to <w>mishit</w> the ball when he is nervous or rushing his shot.
Although she <w>mishit</w> the drive, the ball still rolled onto the green.
